verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Aaron <S%H175><s%>, saying unto them <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, These <S%H2063><s%> are the living things <S%H2416><s%> which ye may eat <S%H398><s%> among all the beasts <S%H929><s%> that are on the earth <S%H776><s%>.

Whatsoever parteth <S%H6536><s%> the hoof <S%H6541><s%>, and is clovenfooted <S%H8156><s%>, and cheweth <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%>, among the beasts <S%H929><s%>, that may ye eat <S%H398><s%>.

Nevertheless <S%H389><s%> these shall ye not eat <S%H398><s%> of them that chew <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%>, or of them that part <S%H6536><s%> the hoof <S%H6541><s%>: the camel <S%H1581><s%>, because he cheweth <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%> but parteth <S%H6536><s%> not the hoof <S%H6541><s%>, he is unclean unto you <S%H2931><s%>.
And the coney <S%H8227><s%>, because he cheweth <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%> but parteth <S%H6536><s%> not the hoof <S%H6541><s%>, he is unclean unto you <S%H2931><s%>.
And the hare <S%H768><s%>, because she cheweth <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%> but parteth <S%H6536><s%> not the hoof <S%H6541><s%>, she is unclean unto you <S%H2931><s%>.

And the swine <S%H2386><s%>, because he parteth <S%H6536><s%> the hoof <S%H6541><s%>, and is clovenfooted <S%H8156><s%>, but cheweth <S%H1641><s%> not the cud <S%H1625><s%>, he is unclean unto you <S%H2931><s%>.
Of their flesh <S%H1320><s%> ye shall not eat <S%H398><s%>, and their carcasses <S%H5038><s%> ye shall not touch <S%H5060><s%>; they are unclean unto you <S%H2931><s%>.

These may ye eat <S%H398><s%> of all that are in the waters <S%H4325><s%>: whatsoever hath fins <S%H5579><s%> and scales <S%H7193><s%> in the waters <S%H4325><s%>, in the seas <S%H3220><s%>, and in the rivers <S%H5158><s%>, that may ye eat <S%H398><s%>.

And all that have not fins <S%H5579><s%> and scales <S%H7193><s%> in the seas <S%H3220><s%>, and in the rivers <S%H5158><s%>, of all that move <S%H8318><s%> in the waters <S%H4325><s%>, and of all the living <S%H2416><s%> creatures <S%H5315><s%> that are in the waters <S%H4325><s%>, they are an abomination unto you <S%H8263><s%>,
and they shall be an abomination <S%H8263><s%> unto you <S%H398><s%>; ye shall not eat of their flesh <S%H1320><s%>, and their carcasses <S%H5038><s%> ye shall have in abomination <S%H8262><s%>.
Whatsoever hath no fins <S%H5579><s%> nor scales <S%H7193><s%> in the waters <S%H4325><s%>, that is an abomination unto you <S%H8263><s%>.

And these ye shall have in abomination <S%H8262><s%> among <S%H4480><s%> the birds <S%H5775><s%>; they shall not be eaten <S%H398><s%>, they are an abomination <S%H8263><s%>: the eagle <S%H5404><s%>, and the gier-eagle <S%H6538><s%>, and the ospray <S%H5822><s%>,
and the kite <S%H344><s%>, and the falcon <S%H344><s%> after its kind <S%H4327><s%>,
every raven <S%H6158><s%> after its kind <S%H4327><s%>,
and the ostrich <S%H1323><s%>, and the night-hawk <S%H8464><s%>, and the sea-mew <S%H7828><s%>, and the hawk <S%H8464><s%> after its kind <S%H4327><s%>,
and the little owl <S%H3563><s%>, and the cormorant <S%H7994><s%>, and the great owl <S%H3244><s%>,
and the horned owl <S%H8580><s%>, and the pelican <S%H6893><s%>, and the vulture <S%H7360><s%>,
and the stork <S%H2624><s%>, the heron <S%H601><s%> after its kind <S%H4327><s%>, and the hoopoe <S%H1744><s%>, and the bat <S%H5847><s%>.
All winged <S%H5775><s%> creeping <S%H8318><s%> things that go <S%H1980><s%> upon all fours <S%H702><s%> are an abomination unto you <S%H8263><s%>.

Yet these may ye eat <S%H398><s%> of all winged <S%H5775><s%> creeping <S%H8318><s%> things that go <S%H1980><s%> upon all fours <S%H702><s%>, which have legs <S%H3767><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> their feet <S%H7272><s%>, wherewith <S%H2004><s%> to leap <S%H5425><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>.

Even these of them ye may eat <S%H398><s%>: the locust <S%H697><s%> after its kind <S%H4327><s%>, and the bald locust <S%H5556><s%> after its kind <S%H4327><s%>, and the cricket <S%H2728><s%> after its kind <S%H4327><s%>, and the grasshopper <S%H2284><s%> after its kind <S%H4327><s%>.
But all winged <S%H5775><s%> creeping things <S%H8318><s%>, which have four <S%H702><s%> feet <S%H7272><s%>, are an abomination unto you <S%H8263><s%>.
And by these ye shall become unclean <S%H2930><s%>: whosoever toucheth <S%H5060><s%> the carcass <S%H5038><s%> of them shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the even <S%H6153><s%>;
And whosoever beareth <S%H5375><s%> aught of the carcass <S%H5038><s%> of them shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes <S%H899><s%>, and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the even <S%H6153><s%>.

Every beast <S%H929><s%> which parteth <S%H6536><s%> the hoof <S%H6541><s%>, and is not clovenfooted <S%H8157><s%>, nor cheweth <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%>, is unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you <S%H5060><s%>: every one that toucheth them shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%>.

And whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> goeth <S%H1980><s%> upon its paws <S%H3709><s%>, among all beasts <S%H2416><s%> that go <S%H1980><s%> on all fours <S%H702><s%>, they are unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you <S%H5060><s%>: whoso toucheth their carcass <S%H5038><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the even <S%H6153><s%>.

And he that beareth <S%H5375><s%> the carcass <S%H5038><s%> of them shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes <S%H899><s%>, and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the even <S%H6153><s%>: they are unclean unto you <S%H2931><s%>.

And these are they which are unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you among the creeping things <S%H8318><s%> that creep <S%H8317><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>: the weasel <S%H2467><s%>, and the mouse <S%H5909><s%>, and the great lizard <S%H6632><s%> after its kind <S%H4327><s%>,
and the gecko <S%H604><s%>, and the land-crocodile <S%H3581><s%>, and the lizard <S%H3911><s%>, and the sand-lizard <S%H2546><s%>, and the chameleon <S%H8580><s%>.

These are they which are unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you among all that creep <S%H8318><s%>: whosoever doth touch <S%H5060><s%> them <S%H4194><s%>, when they are dead, shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the even <S%H6153><s%>.

And upon whatsoever any of them <S%H4194><s%>, when they are dead, doth fall <S%H5307><s%>, it shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%>; whether it be any vessel <S%H3627><s%> of wood <S%H6086><s%>, or raiment <S%H899><s%>, or skin <S%H5785><s%>, or sack <S%H8242><s%>, whatsoever vessel <S%H3627><s%> it be <S%H4399><s%>, wherewith any work is done <S%H6213><s%>, it must be put <S%H935><s%> into water <S%H4325><s%>, and it shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the even <S%H6153><s%>; then shall it be clean.
And every earthen <S%H2789><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%>, whereinto any of them falleth <S%H5307><s%>, whatsoever is in it shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%>, and it ye shall break <S%H7665><s%>.

All food <S%H400><s%> therein which may be eaten <S%H398><s%>, that on which water <S%H4325><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%>, shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%>; and all drink <S%H4945><s%> that may be drunk <S%H8354><s%> in every such vessel <S%H3627><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%>.

And every thing whereupon any part of their carcass <S%H5038><s%> falleth <S%H5307><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%>; whether oven <S%H8574><s%>, or range for pots <S%H2931><s%>, it shall be broken in pieces: they are unclean, and shall be unclean unto you <S%H2931><s%>.

Nevertheless a fountain <S%H4599><s%> or a pit <S%H953><s%> wherein is a gathering of water <S%H4325><s%> shall be clean <S%H2889><s%>: but that which toucheth <S%H5060><s%> their carcass <S%H5038><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%>.
And if aught of their carcass <S%H5038><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> upon any sowing <S%H2221><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> which is to be sown <S%H2232><s%>, it is clean <S%H2889><s%>.
But if water <S%H4325><s%> be put <S%H5414><s%> upon the seed <S%H2233><s%>, and aught of their carcass <S%H5038><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> thereon <S%H2931><s%>, it is unclean unto you.

And if any beast <S%H929><s%>, of which ye may eat <S%H402><s%>, die <S%H4191><s%>; he that toucheth <S%H5060><s%> the carcass <S%H5038><s%> thereof shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the even <S%H6153><s%>.

And he that eateth <S%H398><s%> of the carcass <S%H5038><s%> of it shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes <S%H899><s%>, and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the even <S%H6153><s%>: he also that beareth <S%H5375><s%> the carcass <S%H5038><s%> of it shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes <S%H899><s%>, and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the even <S%H6153><s%>.
And every creeping thing <S%H8318><s%> that creepeth <S%H8317><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%> is an abomination <S%H8263><s%>; it shall not be eaten <S%H398><s%>.

Whatsoever goeth <S%H1980><s%> upon the belly <S%H1512><s%>, and whatsoever goeth <S%H1980><s%> upon all fours <S%H702><s%>, or whatsoever hath many feet <S%H7272><s%>, even all creeping things <S%H8318><s%> that creep <S%H8317><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>, them ye shall not eat <S%H398><s%>; for they are an abomination <S%H8263><s%>.

Ye shall not make <S%H8262><s%> yourselves <S%H5315><s%> abominable <S%H8262><s%> with any creeping thing <S%H8318><s%> that creepeth <S%H8317><s%>, neither shall ye make yourselves unclean <S%H2933><s%> with them <S%H2930><s%>, that ye should be defiled thereby.

For I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>: sanctify yourselves <S%H6942><s%> therefore <S%H6918><s%>, and be ye holy; for I am holy: neither shall ye defile <S%H2930><s%> yourselves <S%H5315><s%> with any manner of creeping thing <S%H8318><s%> that moveth upon the earth <S%H776><s%>.

For I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> that brought <S%H5927><s%> you up out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, to be your God <S%H430><s%>: ye shall therefore be holy <S%H6918><s%>, for I am holy <S%H6918><s%>.

This is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the beast <S%H929><s%>, and of the bird <S%H5775><s%>, and of every living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that moveth <S%H7430><s%> in the waters <S%H4325><s%>, and of every creature <S%H5315><s%> that creepeth <S%H8317><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>;

to make a distinction <S%H914><s%> between the unclean <S%H2931><s%> and the clean <S%H2889><s%>, and between the living thing <S%H2416><s%> that may be eaten <S%H398><s%> and the living thing <S%H2416><s%> that may not be eaten <S%H398><s%>.
